description:
A game that exercises memory and observation skills.

It is easy to play!
・Memorize every detail of the picture within a time limit of 1 minute.
・Answer the question ""? Answer the questions from among 4 choices about what was hidden by ""?

Play alone or with family and friends.
Enjoy the game with family and friends.
It is also recommended for live-playing by distributors.

If you can answer all the questions correctly
the title of ""King of Memory"" will be awarded!
name: Photographic Memory Test
